website_summaries.verdict: The chandelier to choose to really make a visual, artistic statement in your home. Elegant floating rings will ensure this chandelier stands out.
pros: Elegant-looking rings provide a great deal of illumination in larger spaces
Produces less heat and uses less energy via the included LED bulbs
cons: Larger and more difficult to secure than other chandeliers

customer_reviews.title: Very modern looking piece !!!Simply gorgeous !!
customer_reviews.text: It is simply a gorgeous piece ....I bought the black one and it goes perfectly with my decor ! I read reviews about it being difficult to instal it was actually a very easy instal (and I'm a beginner).it is very light weight and the brightness is just enough not to bright and not to dim . I have nothing but good things to say about this and I usually don't write reviews
customer_reviews.author: rudy

customer_reviews.title: Picture is deceptive
customer_reviews.text: Pay very close attention to the size in the product description. It is very small. The pic with the light over a table is deceiving. Also, this fixture is more for ambient lighting. If you need a bright light like in a kitchen, think you may be disappointed. For "show" the light is very good quality. No bulbs to replace so when the light burns out the fixture will need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, great price, functional and easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: We love this light. At a fraction of what other similar looking lights are, I was skeptical but had to try. The reviews mentioning wire tangling they must have changed packaging because mine came neatly wrapped and zip tied in spots to ensure they weren’t tangled. Super easy to install and even easier to adjust to the tilt you like. I installed on a slopes ceiling and am very happy with the look.
customer_reviews.author: Cody McArthur

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Good that I didn’t go with traditional lights, these unique weird looking lights are beautiful very happy.....
customer_reviews.author: Jason Shia

customer_reviews.title: Transformer Problems
customer_reviews.text: The transformer problem others have written about is for real. Only a 30 day warranty and I installed this in a 2nd home about 9 months after I purchased it. Connected and it literally worked for less than 30 seconds. No warranty to cover this. Buy the extended warranty or you may be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Jrh

customer_reviews.title: Great, But didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and installed in Nov 2017, a year and a half later the transformer went out and I can't seem to find a new one available to purchase to replace it. Love the light, need the transformer. Where can I get a MadSHud MS-100-12??
customer_reviews.author: L. Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This light is beautiful! I love it. The only thing I wish is that it was day light not warm color but it’s still very bright
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my post modern home. Very easy to install and can be adjusted to different shapes. If you are looking for something that is really bright this is not it, the light is soft and pleasing, my flower is 29x10 so a large area
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this. It’s bright and easy to install. It came earlier than expected. Perfect light for my dining area.
customer_reviews.author: 1puppy & a headache

customer_reviews.title: It's a cool light.
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool light...the instructions were fairly useless...my biggest complaint is that the light is REALLY bright. The wires were orderly, so it was a matter of adjusting the heights for the effect of the rings being at different angles.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Broken after only 18 months
customer_reviews.text: This stopped working after just a year and a half. Now it just blinks on and off when you turn the light on. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KYLE M.

customer_reviews.title: Product as described.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very modern, bright. Just what I was looking for. Everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, smart-looking. Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely contemporary fixture that looks great over the breakfast bar.
customer_reviews.author: Carol360

customer_reviews.title: Worked for less than a year
customer_reviews.text: After about 11 months light goes on for a second and turns off. Tried to look for their phone number and contact the seller, was unsuccessful. For reputable company that is on NYSE its not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Emil Tuniyants

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great - Easy to Install - Saves Energy
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure this item would help update the commercial building entryway. We installed it as directed and with not any difficulty. It looks great and have had several unsolicited comments from the office staff who saw it on. Plenty of light, energy efficient and looks great, what more would you want?
customer_reviews.author: Dennis King

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works great right out of the box. It was a pretty easy install after glancing at the kinda crappy directions you typically get from these Chinese products.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Lights have transformer problems and consumer has no recourse if they fail after 30 days.
customer_reviews.text: Bought three. Within 6 months all three lights failed because of transformer. Since my last purchase the price has increased by $38 and the return window has been reduced to 30 days. Until LIGHT IN THE BOX addresses the transformer issues I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but very bright
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very nice. Shipped on time. It is SUPER bright. Since it cannot work on dimmers, I may have to replace it because it is so bright. But it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT LIGHT! Looks beautiful and works as expected. Would buy again-
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and exceptionally poor quality. Only worked a few weeks and the warranty is only 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Love the light in my grandson's room
customer_reviews.text: Love the light in my grandson's room. Looks like a solar system. The hanging wires allow the light to be hung at whatever angle and height the purchaser wants. Just wish the light could be dimmed.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Carroll

customer_reviews.title: These are not dimmable!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool, easy install. Is not dimmable and is really bright.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gillette

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and bright light. It is now my favourite light in the house.
customer_reviews.author: cathrine levan

customer_reviews.title: soooo nice.. and sooo different
customer_reviews.text: Soooo bright.. soooo nice.. and sooo different.. I LOVE IT.. AND ALL MY FRIENDS LOVE IT TOO. Looks amazing. Only thing that really sucks about it... is there is no dimmer. That would make it soooooo much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: We would buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: It is great! We have gotten so many compliments on it. Just had to do so sawing to readjust it, make it fit the correct way.
customer_reviews.author: shane mclelland

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my salon and I absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Barahona

customer_reviews.title: Good amount of lighting
customer_reviews.text: I like the way I was able to adjust the height and position of each of the rings.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Vitone

product_meta.title: LightInTheBox 90W Pendant Light Modern Design LED Three Rings Chandeliers Black Color, Light Source=Warm White, Voltage=110-120V
feature_bullets: Suggested Room Fit: 40-50㎡ Game Room, Kids Room, Study Room/Office, Dining Room, Living Room
Note: LightInTheBox is A Registered Trademark in USA since 2013 with no Retailers on Amazon.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars79 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
